alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:37PM PST until December 16 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY TO 2 AM MST /1 AM PST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except up to 6 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast Oregon and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Wednesday to 2 AM MST /1 AM PST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Along with reduced visibility and slick roads, gusty winds will make travel difficult for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
